title: Customized Online Language Learning Design and Retention Rate Improvement Strategies

context.additional_context: Learners are non-degree-seeking adults from diverse geographical and cultural backgrounds participating in online real-time classes to improve language proficiency. Strengthen practical skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can design online language learning activities tailored to their cultural background and learning style
Learners can complete language tasks by consistently participating in online sessions at least three times a week for four weeks
Learners can enhance practical communication skills in the target language by 20% through collaborative activities with peers
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
